description: Enable powerful LLM-driven exploration and analysis of GitLab instances with comprehensive search, code browsing, and issue management tools. Seamlessly integrate with self-hosted or GitLab.com environments using flexible authentication modes. Optimize AI workflows with automatic GraphQL schema discovery and dynamic query capabilities.

capabilities.name: get_project
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific GitLab project (read-only)

capabilities.name: get_issues
capabilities.description: Get issues from a specific GitLab project (read-only)

capabilities.name: get_merge_requests
capabilities.description: Get merge requests from a specific GitLab project (read-only)

capabilities.name: execute_custom_query
capabilities.description: Execute custom GraphQL queries for complex filtering (e.g., issues with assigneeUsernames: ["user"], labelName: ["bug"]). Use this for structured filtering by assignee/author/labels when search tools return 0 results. Use pagination and limit complexity to avoid timeouts.

capabilities.name: get_available_queries
capabilities.description: Get list of available GraphQL queries and mutations from the GitLab schema

capabilities.name: get_current_user
capabilities.description: Get information about the current authenticated GitLab user

capabilities.name: get_projects
capabilities.description: List projects accessible to the user (requires authentication to see private projects)

capabilities.name: create_issue
capabilities.description: Create a new issue in a GitLab project (requires user authentication with write permissions)

capabilities.name: create_merge_request
capabilities.description: Create a new merge request in a GitLab project (requires user authentication with write permissions)

capabilities.name: update_issue
capabilities.description: Update an issue (title, description, assignees, labels, due date) with schema-aware mutations

capabilities.name: update_merge_request
capabilities.description: Update a merge request (title, description, assignees, reviewers, labels) with schema-aware mutations

capabilities.name: resolve_path
capabilities.description: Resolve a GitLab path to either a project or group and list group projects when applicable

capabilities.name: get_group_projects
capabilities.description: List projects inside a GitLab group (optionally filter by search term)

capabilities.name: get_type_fields
capabilities.description: List available fields on a GraphQL type using introspected schema (requires schema to be introspected)

capabilities.name: search_gitlab
capabilities.description: Text search across GitLab projects and issues (Note: Does not support filtering by assignee/labels - use search_issues for that. MRs cannot be searched globally - use search_merge_requests with username)

capabilities.name: search_projects
capabilities.description: Search for GitLab projects by name or description

capabilities.name: search_issues
capabilities.description: Search for issues with text search and/or structured filtering (assignee, author, labels, state). For filtering by assignee/author/labels without text search, leave searchTerm empty.

capabilities.name: search_merge_requests
capabilities.description: Search merge requests by username (supports "username", "author:username", "assignee:username") or search within a specific project. Note: GitLab does not support global text search for MRs - use projectPath for text searches.

capabilities.name: get_user_issues
capabilities.description: Get all issues assigned to a specific user - uses proper GraphQL filtering for reliable results

capabilities.name: get_user_merge_requests
capabilities.description: Get merge requests for a specific user (as author or assignee) - uses proper GraphQL filtering

capabilities.name: search_users
capabilities.description: Search for GitLab users by username or name - useful for finding team members or contributors

capabilities.name: search_groups
capabilities.description: Search for GitLab groups and organizations

capabilities.name: browse_repository
capabilities.description: Browse repository files and folders - essential for exploring codebase structure

capabilities.name: get_file_content
capabilities.description: Get the content of a specific file from a GitLab repository - crucial for code analysis
